label: ham
subject: Re: [R] Plotting very skewed data in barplot
body: If Ricardo had built up this theory by abstract reasoning, as we have done it here, without introducing concrete facts and incidental matters which only distract his attention from the main question, its hollowness would be striking. But he takes up the entire subject in its _international_ aspect. It will be easy to prove, however, that the apparent magnitude of scale does not make his fundamental ideas less diminutive.
